entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
